result.arabic_text: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ
result.translation: Ababangikanyamana, ntibigera bashikirwa n’inkebuzo nshasha ivuye kwa Nyenimpuhwe Allah, ibabwiriza ivyo bakora n’ivyo bareka mu kwubahiriza idini ry’ukuri, kiretse ko birengagiza nya nkebuzo, bakayihakana bivuye inyuma, bakanayamirira kure.
